text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump How many dead to do so before you meet any of your own guide lines? Ffs, 45, aka don sr, why don't you be a real warrior & go out there & chance illness & death? Your bone spurs will not be a problem at all when it comes to covid-19 you ff.
